Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with Direct-dial phone, Front Desk Fax, Safe box, 24 hours reception service, Coffee Bar, Variety of Snacks, Free Internet, Free parking limited space(first comes first served), Hired Bicycles.
Important place or monument close to the hotel: Beach - 20m. Venetian Port 200m, Venetian Castle 400m, City Centre old town 200m.
